column4: guys, i have dual boot kubuntu and xp, both works fine before, but sudenlly now xp won't boot!, when i tried to boot xp, grub show me only "starting up" and a blinking cursor, it seems grub can't find xp kernel or anything to need xp boot..
you probably need to re-install grub
reboot, see if xp is there
sudo grub install makes me in grub session (in konsole, i'm in grub> prompt) do i just type reboot?
sorry, forgot a big part of that
see that nice manual page?  most commands have one. Stuff in it may seem cryptic at first, but it will start to make sense
so we need to specify a device
easiest solution, get rid of windows :)
lol..yup but i still need it..hehe
